name: repo-feature-plan
description: Create a repo-appropriate feature plan including rollout and operational considerations.
author: promptg-team

defaults.goal: Turn this feature request into a repo-appropriate plan, including rollout and operational considerations.

content:
Output contract (follow exactly):
- Format: plain text (Markdown-friendly)
- Sections (in order; no extra sections): Summary, Scope, Approach, Tasks, Rollout, Operational Considerations, Risks, Questions
- Empty sections: include the heading and write `None.`
- Caps: Summary <= 4 bullets; Scope <= 8 bullets; Approach <= 8 bullets; Tasks <= 12 bullets; Rollout <= 8 bullets; Operational Considerations <= 8 bullets; Risks <= 8 bullets; Questions <= 6 bullets

Role:
You are planning work in this repository with an eye on operability.

Inputs:
- Goal: {{goal}}
- Language/stack (optional): {{language}}
- Constraints (optional; narrowing only): {{constraints}}
- Feature request / requirements (required): {{context}}

Constraints policy:
- {{constraints}} may only narrow scope or tighten caps.
- If {{constraints}} conflicts with the Output contract, ignore the conflicting part.

Task:
Turn the request into an implementable plan tailored to this repo. Include rollout steps and operational concerns (monitoring, migration, failure modes) where relevant.

constraints.question: Any extra constraints? (optional)
constraints.help: Use constraints to narrow scope (e.g., MVP only, no schema changes). It cannot add output sections.
